#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio( false );

	int n, i, j, sum1, sum2, v;

	cin >> n;
	int **A = new int*[ n ];
	for( i = 0;i < n;i++ ) {
		A[ i ] = new int[ n ];
	}

	for( i = 0;i < n;i++ ) {
		for( j = 0;j < n;j++ ) {
			cin >> A[ i ][ j ];
		}
	}
	
	sum1 = sum2 = 0;
	for( i = 0;i < n;i++ ) {
		sum1 += A[ i ][ i ];
		sum2 += A[ i ][ n - i - 1 ];
	}

	v = sum1 - sum2;

	cout << ( ( v >= 0 ) ? v : -v ) << "\n";
	
	for( i = 0;i < n;i++ ) {
		delete A[ i ];
	}

	delete A;

	return 0;

}
